attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All MP's and government employees found to have committed fraud in claims and expenses etc should be forced to resign and repay what they stole with costs.
 They also should never be allowed to hold a government position again at any level.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
